Exercise

Find the tangent line to the parametric curve \(x=t^2-t, \ \ \) \(y=t^2+t\) at the point where \(t={@bb@}\).

Equation of tangent line: \(y =\) [[input:ans1]] [[validation:ans1]]

generalfeedback.text:
We are asked to find the tangent line to the parametric curve \(x=t^2-t, \ \ \) \(y=t^2+t\) at the point where \(t={@bb@}\).

To find the tangent line, we need the derivative \( \dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x}.\) Since we have parametric equations, we must find this derivative in terms of \( \dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}t}\) and \( \dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t}.\) So

\(\qquad \displaystyle x=t^2-t \implies \dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t} = 2t - 1\), and

\(\qquad \displaystyle y=t^2+t \implies \dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}t} = 2t + 1.\)


So since \(\quad \dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x}=\dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}t}\div\dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t}, \quad\) here we have

\( \qquad \displaystyle \dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x} = {@deriv@} \quad \), and at the point \(t={@bb@}\),

\( \qquad \displaystyle \dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x} = {@cc@}.\)


Now we find the point at which the tangent meets the curve.

\(\qquad \displaystyle t={@bb@} \implies x= {@bb@}^2 - {@bb@} = {@dd@}, \quad \) and

\(\qquad \displaystyle t={@bb@} \implies y = {@bb@}^2+ {@bb@} = {@ee@}.\)

So our gradient \(\displaystyle \dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x} = {@cc@}\) and our point \(({@dd@},{@ee@})\) gives the equation of the tangent line:

\(\begin{align} \qquad \displaystyle y - {@ee@} &= {@cc@}(x-{@dd@}) \\ y &= {@ta1@}. \end{align}\).


A graph of the curve and the corresponding tangent is shown below:

[[jsxgraph]] var board = JXG.JSXGraph.initBoard(divid, { // STACK: when moving to STACK change 'jxgboard' for divid boundingbox: [-3, {#p2+3#}, {#p1+3#}, -3], keepaspectratio: true, showCopyright: false, axis: true, showNavigation: true }); // Parameter value (from STACK variable) const t0 = {#bb#}; // Parametric functions const f = t => t * t - t; const g = t => t * t + t; // Create the parametric curve for t in [-10,10] board.create('curve', [f, g, -10, 10], { strokeColor: 'blue', strokeWidth: 2 }); // Compute point on curve at t = t0 const x0 = f(t0); const y0 = g(t0); // Derivatives const df = 2 * t0 - 1; const dg = 2 * t0 + 1; const m = dg / df; // Create the tangent point board.create('point', [x0, y0], { name: '', size: 2, color: 'red', fixed: true }); // Create tangent line at P with slope m board.create('line', [ () => [x0, y0], () => [x0 + 1, y0 + m] ], { strokeColor: 'green', dash: 2 }); [[/jsxgraph]]
